title: The Bitch's Tale
description: Fuelled by jealousy and hatred, she'll do anything to keep her men and destroy her rival.Ambitious, sex-crazed bully Decima, TV presenter, sham witch and boss of a 4-man harem. Although bound by contract and loyalty to Decima, the guys are drawn helplessly to Alice, her na√Øve, kind PA. But Alice has many secrets. She's a real witch rearing a fighting demon and in love with a man she can never have. Queen of dirty tricks, Decima will stop at nothing to keep her guys and destroy Alice. Anything could happen.
author: Kelly Alleyn
